data.text: @SharonHutchiso5 @SandraWeeden They are now earning more money working in offices or shops and wondering why the hell they would want to wipe arses for minimum wage again, especially when theyll have the same threat next time a new "pandemic" comes along

@SandraWeeden Great news BUT WHY NOT NOW? Are they still hoping to poison just a few more to meet the targets of the NHS management and their Deep State asswipe handlers….not that I’m being cynical or anything 🤔🤔🤔🤔🤥🤥🤥🤥🤥
